Invasion_PGF.cts_time_R0¶

Invasion_PGF.cts_time_R0(beta, gamma)[source]¶

Gives R0 assuming transmission rate beta and recovery rate gamma

Arguments :

beta (float)
transmission rate
gamma (float)
recovery rate
Returns :
R0 (float)
equal to beta/gamma
SAMPLE USE: 
import Invasion_PGF as pgf

beta=2
gamma = 1

R0 = pgf.cts_time_R0(beta,gamma)
R0
> 2.0

Next topic
